document.full_text: john c. malone's media company is offering $17 a share in cash, or $1.02 billion total, a 20 percent premium over barnes & noble's closing stock price.
document.title: liberty media bids for barnes & noble
lines_and_colors: john c. malone's media company is offering $17 a share in cash, or $1.02 billion total, a 20 percent premium over barnes & noble's closing stock price.
